intro_why_body:
Contact-tracing is a critical tool for containing the spread of infectious diseases.

It allows health professionals to quickly get information and tests to the right people in order to prevent further transmission.
intro_how_body:
This app works in the backgrouind using GPS and Bluetooth to identify other users you may have had contact with.

This information securely encrypted and can only be decrypted by this device. Your data (encrypted or decrypted) is not shared with anyone without your explicit consent.

This app constantly montors for new confirmed cases and will alert you if you've had significant contact another user and should get in touch with health professionals.
